synopsis.text: Be captivated by the poignant melodies and evocative visuals in the music video for "It Might Be Painful, but I Still Love It." by TUYU, serving as the perfect finale to each episode of 'Tokyo Revengers: Seiya Kessen-hen'. This masterful creation, directed by Kumamiso, beautifully encapsulates the essence of the anime, providing a tantalizing taste of the emotional rollercoaster that awaits viewers. Delve into the world of Tokyo Revengers and let this enchanting music video guide you through a journey of love, pain, and unwavering resilience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
